name: Nagios-plugins-linux
body:
### Overview.
The _nagios-plugins-linux_ is a set of several Nagios plugins for monitoring Linux boxes. 
Nagios is an open source computer system monitoring, network monitoring and infrastructure monitoring software application (see: [http://www.nagios.org/](http://www.nagios.org/)).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
